main event: Witnesses observed a bright light in the sky moving erratically in Longmeadow, Massachusetts.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for approximately 40 minutes., The object exhibited rapid climbs and dives., Witnesses reported that the object changed shape as it changed altitude., The object was described as being 1/x as bright as a star., There were two engineers as confirmed witnesses.
sighted object: a bright light in the sky
